content.rendered: Key representatives from our partner, KIMMCO Isover Kevin Pereira (MD), Karthik John (Senior Sales Engineer), Nisha Alexander (Regional Specification Manager), Syed Ilyas (Division Manager – HVAC), and Syed Naveed (Specification Engineer), gathered at TTE’s corporate office to discuss the promising future of Climaver, a Glass wool based pre-insulated duct system. A significant part of the discussion revolved around marketing strategies to enhance awareness of Climaver within the UAE region. The focus was on strategizing and positioning the product emphasizing product’s differentiating features like energy efficiency, reduced installation costs etc.
